meta.description: Course selection problem for a master's student in Operations Research

vars.name: x
vars.description: x[c] = 1 if course c is taken, 0 otherwise

objective.name: min_courses
objective.description: Minimize the number of courses taken

constraints.name: math_courses
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(category[c]['math'] * x[c] for c in COURSES)
constraints.description: At least two math courses must be taken

constraints.name: operations_research_courses
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(category[c]['operations_research'] * x[c] for c in COURSES)
constraints.description: At least two operations research courses must be taken

constraints.name: computer_courses
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(category[c]['computer'] * x[c] for c in COURSES)
constraints.description: At least two computer courses must be taken

constraints.name: prerequisite_computer_simulation
constraints.description: Computer simulation requires computer programming as a prerequisite

constraints.name: prerequisite_data_structures
constraints.description: Data structures requires computer programming as a prerequisite

constraints.name: prerequisite_management_statistics
constraints.description: Management statistics requires calculus as a prerequisite

constraints.name: prerequisite_forecasting
constraints.description: Forecasting requires management statistics as a prerequisite
